headline: S&P Global Inc. (SPGI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on S&P Global Inc. (SPGI) on Substack by Felix. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on SPGI. S&P Global Inc. (SPGI)’s share was trading at $470.71 as of April 15th. SPGI’s trailing and forward P/E were 38.11 and 27.40 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. S&P Global is currently […]

headline: Central Europe cannot expect big boost from German fiscal expansion, S&P says
summary: Central Europe cannot expect a big boost from Germany's fiscal expansion despite strong links to Europe's largest economy, where part of the stimulus benefits will be offset by U.S. tariff effects and...
